import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaUser, FaPhone, FaEnvelope, FaBuilding, FaMapMarkerAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Register: React.FC = () => { const [step, setStep] = useState(1); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', phone: '', email: '', address: '', buildingType: 'home', // home, business, corporate systemType: '', // Seçilen güvenlik sistemi additionalInfo: '' }); const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); // Form gönderme işlemi console.log('Form data:', formData); }; return (

setFormData({...formData, lastName: e.target.value})} className="block w-full border-gray-300 rounded-md shadow-sm focus:ring-primary focus:border-primary" required />
